original_text: The man answered and said unto them, Why herein is a marvellous thing, that ye know not from whence he is, and yet he hath opened mine eyes.
korean_text: 그 사람이 대답하여 이르되 이상하다 이 사람이 내 눈을 뜨게 하였으되 당신들은 그가 어디서 왔는지 알지 못하는도다

sentences.original_text: The man answered and said unto them
Why herein is a marvellous thing
that ye know not from whence he is
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 어디서 왔는지 너희가 알지 못하면서도

sentences.original_text: and yet he hath opened mine eyes
